Package chess

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Board
  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a board using a set of Location objects. *

    Stores a set of Locations, describing a board. Includes methods for retrieving the set and checking if it contains a given location.

    Author:
    Johann von Tiesenhausen

    • Constructor Summary

      • Square

        public static Board Square​(int size)
        Returns a square board with size rows and columns, starting at (0, 0) and ending at (size - 1, size - 1).
        Parameters:
        size - side length of the square board.
        Returns:
        Board object representing a square board.

      • Rectangle

        public static Board Rectangle​(int width,
                              int height)
        Creates a rectangular board with width rows and height columns, starting at (0, 0) and ending at (width - 1, height - 1).
        Parameters:
        width - number of columns (x)
        height - number of rows (y)
        Returns:
        Board object representing a rectangular board.

      • Circle

        public static Board Circle​(int radius)
        Creates a circular board, rasterizing our squares using the midpoint circle algorithm. Board will be centered around (radius - 1, radius - 1).
        Parameters:
        radius - circle radius, maximum rows and columns are both radius * 2
        Returns:
        Board object representing a circle.
        See Also:
        midpoint circle algorithm
